mapper.select: SELECT (case when SUBSTRING(MAX(contract_no),9,5) is null then 'WX'+CONVERT(varchar(6), GETDATE(), 112)+'00001' else 'WX'+CONVERT(varchar(6), GETDATE(), 112)+SUBSTRING(MAX(contract_no),9,5) end ) FROM contract_purchase WHERE LEFT(contract_no, 8)='WX'+CONVERT(varchar(6), GETDATE(), 112)
